snippet: Federal prosecutors have another month to decide whether to ask the Supreme Court to review a ruling that narrowed the definition of insider trading.
abstract: DealBook Online; federal prosecutors have until Aug 1 to decide whether to ask Supreme Court to review critical ruling in insider trading case involving former hedge fund traders Todd Newman and Anthony Chiasson.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors have another month to decide whether to ask the Supreme Court to review a ruling that narrowed the definition of insider trading.

headline.main: U.S. Gets More Time to Consider Insider-Trading Appeal
